name: Life of Pi
description: "Life of Pi" is a remarkable novel by Yann Martel, which was also adapted into a visually stunning film directed by Ang Lee. The story follows Pi Patel, a young boy from India, who survives a shipwreck in the Pacific Ocean and ends up on a lifeboat with a Bengal tiger named Richard Parker.

name: Interstellar
description: "Interstellar" is a science fiction film directed by Christopher Nolan. The film follows a group of astronauts who travel through a wormhole near Saturn in search of a new home for humanity.

name: Titanic
description: "Titanic" is a romantic drama film directed by James Cameron. The film is based on the real-life sinking of the RMS Titanic and follows the love story of Jack and Rose, two passengers from different social classes.

name: Iron Man
description: "Iron Man" is a superhero film based on the Marvel Comics character of the same name. Directed by Jon Favreau, the film follows Tony Stark, a billionaire industrialist and genius inventor, who builds a high-tech suit of armor to become the superhero Iron Man.
